ADD_LIBRARY(emb_controller STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(emb_controller PROPERTIES
    IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib_emb_controller.a")

ADD_LIBRARY(emb_peripheral STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(emb_peripheral PROPERTIES
    IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib_emb_peripheral.a")

ADD_LIBRARY(emb_peripheral_legacy STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(emb_peripheral_legacy PROPERTIES
    IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib_emb_peripheral_legacy.a")

ADD_LIBRARY(emb_peripheral_advext STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(emb_peripheral_advext PROPERTIES
    IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib_emb_peripheral_advext.a")

ADD_LIBRARY(emb_central STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(emb_central PROPERTIES
    IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib_emb_central.a")

ADD_LIBRARY(emb_central_advext STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(emb_central_advext PROPERTIES
    IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib_emb_central_advext.a")

ADD_LIBRARY(emb_pawr_advertiser STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(emb_pawr_advertiser PROPERTIES
    IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib_emb_pawr_advertiser.a")

ADD_LIBRARY(emb_pawr_synchronizer STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(emb_pawr_synchronizer PROPERTIES
    IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib_emb_pawr_synchronizer.a")

ADD_LIBRARY(emb_ll_pal STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(emb_ll_pal PROPERTIES
    IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib_emb_ll_pal.a")

ADD_LIBRARY(emb_controller_iso STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(emb_controller_iso PROPERTIES
    IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib_emb_controller_iso.a")

ADD_LIBRARY(emb_audio STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(emb_audio PROPERTIES
    IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib_emb_audio.a")

ADD_LIBRARY(emb_cte_transmitter STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(emb_cte_transmitter PROPERTIES
    IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib_emb_cte_transmitter.a")

ADD_LIBRARY(emb_database STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(emb_database PROPERTIES
    IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib_emb_database.a")

ADD_LIBRARY(emb_database_di03 STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(emb_database_di03 PROPERTIES
    IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib_emb_database_di03.a")

ADD_LIBRARY(emb_lite_peripheral STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(emb_lite_peripheral PROPERTIES
    IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib_emb_lite_peripheral.a")

ADD_LIBRARY(emb_lite_peripheral_legacy STATIC IMPORTED GLOBAL)
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(emb_lite_peripheral_legacy PROPERTIES
    IMPORTED_LOCATION "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib_emb_lite_peripheral_legacy.a")

SET(PACKETCRAFT_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/packetcraft")
SET(EMB_EXTENSIONS_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/emb_extensions")
SET(EMB_LITE_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/emb_lite")
SET(EMB_VERIF_CFG_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/emb_configs/verified")

SET(PLATFORM_CMAKE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cmake/platform")
INCLUDE("${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cmake/common/common.cmake")
INCLUDE("${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cmake/platform/platform.cmake")

ADD_TARGET_COMPILE_OPTIONS_ALL_BUILD_CONFIGS(emb_controller BEFORE INTERFACE -include ${EMB_VERIF_CFG_DIR}/cfg_emb_controller.h)
ADD_TARGET_COMPILE_OPTIONS_ALL_BUILD_CONFIGS(emb_peripheral BEFORE INTERFACE -include ${EMB_VERIF_CFG_DIR}/cfg_emb_peripheral.h)
ADD_TARGET_COMPILE_OPTIONS_ALL_BUILD_CONFIGS(emb_peripheral_legacy BEFORE INTERFACE -include ${EMB_VERIF_CFG_DIR}/cfg_emb_peripheral_legacy.h)
ADD_TARGET_COMPILE_OPTIONS_ALL_BUILD_CONFIGS(emb_peripheral_advext BEFORE INTERFACE -include ${EMB_VERIF_CFG_DIR}/cfg_emb_peripheral_advext.h)
ADD_TARGET_COMPILE_OPTIONS_ALL_BUILD_CONFIGS(emb_central BEFORE INTERFACE -include ${EMB_VERIF_CFG_DIR}/cfg_emb_central.h)
ADD_TARGET_COMPILE_OPTIONS_ALL_BUILD_CONFIGS(emb_central_advext BEFORE INTERFACE -include ${EMB_VERIF_CFG_DIR}/cfg_emb_central_advext.h)
ADD_TARGET_COMPILE_OPTIONS_ALL_BUILD_CONFIGS(emb_pawr_advertiser BEFORE INTERFACE -include ${EMB_VERIF_CFG_DIR}/cfg_emb_pawr_advertiser.h)
ADD_TARGET_COMPILE_OPTIONS_ALL_BUILD_CONFIGS(emb_pawr_synchronizer BEFORE INTERFACE -include ${EMB_VERIF_CFG_DIR}/cfg_emb_pawr_synchronizer.h)
ADD_TARGET_COMPILE_OPTIONS_ALL_BUILD_CONFIGS(emb_ll_pal BEFORE INTERFACE -include ${EMB_VERIF_CFG_DIR}/cfg_pal_only.h)
ADD_TARGET_COMPILE_OPTIONS_ALL_BUILD_CONFIGS(emb_controller_iso BEFORE INTERFACE -include ${EMB_VERIF_CFG_DIR}/cfg_emb_controller_iso.h)
ADD_TARGET_COMPILE_OPTIONS_ALL_BUILD_CONFIGS(emb_audio BEFORE INTERFACE -include ${EMB_VERIF_CFG_DIR}/cfg_emb_audio.h)
ADD_TARGET_COMPILE_OPTIONS_ALL_BUILD_CONFIGS(emb_cte_transmitter BEFORE INTERFACE -include ${EMB_VERIF_CFG_DIR}/cfg_emb_cte_transmitter.h)
